channel.title: Fixed
channel.description:
FIXED. it had to do with my NPC.cfg. [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3 at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:1342) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:21) at server.main(server.java:27) [/code] idk whats wrong..
no compile errors..
this is line 1342 of NPC handler: [code] newNPCList(Integer.parseInt(token3[0]), token3[1], Integer.parseInt(token3[2]), Integer.parseInt(token3[3]));[/code]
this is line 21 of npc handler: [code]loadNPCList("npc.cfg");[/code]
and like 27 is empty in server.java.
help me ploxer..
